sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		XDimID as integer,
		YDimID as integer,
		DimKindID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
source1 sink(input(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		KindID = DimKindID
	)) ~> sink1
